str2: Probably from the same as pale; anew, i.e. back, once more, or furthermore or on the other hand.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From eu and phren; to put in a good frame of mind, i.e. Rejoice.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Apparently a primary word; a people.
